org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.metaclass
Class AbstractDynamicMethods

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.metaclass.AbstractDynamicMethods
All Implemented Interfaces:
DynamicMethods
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractDynamicMethodsInterceptor, DefaultDynamicMethods, DomainClassMethods
public abstract class AbstractDynamicMethods
extends Object
implements DynamicMethods

This class provides the base implementation responsible for performing dynamic method invocation such as the dynamic finders in GORM

Since:
0.1 Created: Aug 7, 2005
Author:
Steven Devijver, Graeme Rocher
